Package org.freehep.record.loop.event.test

Provides tests to exercise the classes in the org.freehep.record.loop.event package.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ChainableRecordListenerDecoratorTest This class defines the tests that any ChainableRecordListener object should pass.
RecordAdapterTest This class defines the tests that any RecordAdapter object should pass.
RecordListenerManagerNoRunTest This class defines the tests that any RecordListenerManager object should pass.
RecordListenerNoRunTest This class defines the tests that any RecordListener object should pass.
RecordLoopListenerNoRunTest This class defines the tests that any RecordLoopListener object should pass.
 

Package org.freehep.record.loop.event.test Description

Provides tests to exercise the classes in the org.freehep.record.loop.event package.
